title: Progressive Radio News Hour
content:
Mads Gilbert is a Norwegian anesthesiologist and University of North Norway Professor of Anesthesiology. <!--more--> He heads the University of Norway, Tromso’s Emergency Medicine Department, and served extensively with NORWAC (the Norwegian Aid Committee) and the Palestine Committee in Occupied Palestine and Lebanon.
He and Dr Erik Fosse provided heroic medical services to Gazans, injured during Israel’s Cast Lead war.
Their new book, “Eyes in Gaza,” covers their work and will be discussed on the program.
